ygData.subject: Re: classes and races
ygData.msgSnippet: They are suppose too :) Angarth, Clan Anstruther, Warrior of the 15th Tier Periissem ni periisem
ygData.messageBody:
They are suppose too :)


Angarth, Clan Anstruther, Warrior of the 15th Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"


> ----------
> From: Kelly Pruett[SMTP:pruett@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] classes and races
>
> From: Kelly Pruett <pruett@...>
>
> Which may explain why they all kill you on sight. You dark elves should
> crawn back in the scrawny dark holes you crawled out of before you taste
> another human blade.
>
> -Faderic
>
> OOC: Actually if it weren't so damned hard to play DE maybe it would be a
> nicer race. Seems to me that Barbs, Ogres, and Trolls got a tremendous
> warrior advantage in this game.
>
>
>
> Jason Coan wrote:
>
> > From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
> >
> > ya know why? because humans, stat-wise, pretty much suck. ie, and DE
> has base int of 99, human has 100 as max......DE warriors are almost as
> smart as human casters, haha, and I always remind them of this when I see
> them :) (assuming its day time and they are not more than 5 steps away so
> they can see me). And thats just an example of their pathetic
> inteligence, the rest of their stats are equally unimpressive.
> >
